name: Gluten Free Pizza
description: A classic Italian dish featuring a flatbread topped with tomato sauce, cheese, and various toppings
instructions: Preheat the oven to 220°C (428°F).
Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface.
Spread tomato sauce over the dough, leaving a small border around the edges.
Sprinkle mozzarella cheese evenly over the sauce.
Add pepperoni slices and sprinkle with Italian herbs.
Drizzle a little olive oil on top, Bake in the oven for 10-15 minutes or until the crust is golden brown.

name: Salad
description: A healthy and refreshing mix of fresh greens and vegetables
instructions: Wash and dry the mixed greens.
Slice cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and red onion.
In a large bowl, combine the greens and vegetables.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Toss gently to combine.

name: Sweet Potato
description: A nutritious and delicious root vegetable, naturally sweet and rich in vitamins.
instructions: Preheat oven to 200°C (392°F).
Peel and slice sweet potatoes into wedges.
Toss in olive oil, salt, pepper, and cinnamon.
Arrange on a baking sheet in a single layer.
Roast for 25-30 minutes, flipping halfway through.

name: Gnocchi
description: Soft, pillowy pasta made from potatoes, served with a rich tomato sauce.
instructions: Cook gnocchi in boiling salted water until they float to the top.
Drain and toss with olive oil.
Simmer tomato sauce in a pan.
Add gnocchi to the sauce and mix well.
Serve with grated Parmesan and fresh basil.

name: Pot Roast
description: A savory and hearty beef dish, slow-cooked to perfection with vegetables.
instructions: Preheat oven to 160°C (320°F).
Season the beef with salt and pepper.
Brown it in a pot with olive oil.
Add chopped vegetables and garlic.
Pour in beef broth.
Cover and roast in the oven for 3-4 hours.

name: Lasagna
description: Layers of pasta, rich meat sauce, and creamy cheese baked to perfection.
instructions: Cook lasagna noodles as per package instructions.
Brown ground beef in a pan.
Add tomato sauce and Italian herbs to beef, simmer.
Layer noodles, meat sauce, ricotta, and mozzarella in a baking dish.
Repeat layers, finishing with cheese.
Bake at 180°C (356°F) for 45 minutes.

name: Hamburger
description: A juicy beef patty served in a bun with your favorite toppings.
instructions: Form ground beef into patties, season with salt and pepper.
Cook patties on a grill or pan over medium heat.
Assemble burgers with buns, lettuce, tomato, cheese, and condiments.

name: Pad Thai
description: A popular Thai noodle dish with a sweet and tangy sauce, mixed with chicken or tofu.
instructions: Cook rice noodles according to package instructions.
Stir-fry chicken or tofu until cooked through.
Add bean sprouts and noodles, toss together.
Stir in Pad Thai sauce and cook for 2 minutes.
Push everything to one side of the pan, add egg, scramble, and mix.
Garnish with peanuts and green onions.

name: Almonds
description: Crunchy and nutritious nuts, great as a snack or an ingredient in dishes.
instructions: Enjoy raw or lightly toast almonds in a pan over medium heat.

name: Sarma
description: Traditional dish featuring grape leaves stuffed with rice and meat.
instructions: Combine meat, rice, and chopped onion.
Roll mixture in grape leaves.
Arrange in a pot, cover with water and lemon juice.
Simmer on low heat for 1-1.5 hours.

name: Bacon
description: Crispy, salty slices of cured pork, perfect for breakfast or as a flavor booster.
instructions: Cook bacon in a pan over medium heat until crispy.
Drain on paper towels.

name: Hot Dog
description: A classic American snack consisting of a sausage served in a bun.
instructions: Boil or grill hot dog sausages.
Place in buns and top with desired condiments.

name: Chocolate Cake
description: Rich and moist chocolate cake, perfect for any dessert lover.
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C (356°F).
Mix dry ingredients in one bowl.
Beat eggs, butter, and milk in another bowl.
Combine and pour into a greased cake pan.
Bake for 30-35 minutes until a toothpick comes out clean.
Let cool, then frost with chocolate frosting.

name: Wheat Bread
description: Nutty and wholesome whole wheat bread, great for sandwiches and toasts.
instructions: Mix warm water, yeast, and oil.
Add flour and salt, knead into a dough.
Let rise until doubled in size.
Shape into a loaf and bake at 180°C (356°F) for 30-35 minutes.

name: Orange
description: Sweet and juicy, oranges are a refreshing and healthy snack.
instructions: Peel and segment oranges to enjoy as a snack.

name: Banana
description: A sweet and convenient fruit, rich in potassium and easy to eat on the go.
instructions: Peel and eat bananas raw.

name: Yogurt
description: Creamy and tangy yogurt, perfect as a breakfast or dessert with fruits and honey.
instructions: Serve yogurt as is or top with fruits, nuts, and honey for added flavor.
